response_headers.Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, max-age=31536000, private, must-revalidate
response_headers.Content-Security-Policy: script-src 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://code.jquery.com https://www.google.com https://www.gstatic.com https://connect.facebook.net https://www.google-analytics.com https://ajax.googleapis.com https://cdn.datatables.net https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://fastly.ink.sapo.pt https://buttons.github.io https://platform.twitter.com https://ws.sharethis.com https://cdn.syndication.twimg.com https://t.sharethis.com https://twitter.com https://www.googletagmanager.com https://ssl.google-analytics.com https://fonts.google.com https://static.hotjar.com https://dcinfos.abtasty.com https://script.hotjar.com https://f.vimeocdn.com https://www.youtube.com https://unpkg.com https://player.vimeo.com https://cdn.tiny.cloud https://cdn.tagcommander.com https://cdn.trustcommander.net https://tag.aticdn.net https://cdn.trustcommander.net https://ipinfo.io https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com https://ajax.googleapis.com https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com https://api.dmcdn.net https://js.hcaptcha.com https://cdn.tailwindcss.com https://addevent.com https://cdn.addevent.com https://www.addevent.com https://myux.presse.economie.gouv.fr https://platform.linkedin.com https://try.abtasty.com https://gva.et-gv.fr 'self';  ;  object-src 'self'
response_headers.Feature-Policy: geolocation 'none'; midi 'none'; camera 'none'; usb 'none'; magnetometer 'none'; accelerometer 'none'; vr 'none'; speaker 'none'; ambient-light-sensor 'none'; gyroscope 'none'; microphone 'none'

content-security-policy.name: content-security-policy
content-security-policy.score_description: Content Security Policy (CSP) implemented unsafely. This includes 'unsafe-inline' or data: inside script-src, overly broad sources such as https: inside object-src or script-src, or not restricting the sources for object-src or script-src.

contribute.name: contribute
contribute.score_description: Contribute.json isn't required on websites that don't belong to Mozilla

cookies.name: cookies
cookies.score_description: Session cookie set without using the HttpOnly flag

cross-origin-resource-sharing.name: cross-origin-resource-sharing
cross-origin-resource-sharing.score_description: Public content is visible via cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) Access-Control-Allow-Origin header

redirection.name: redirection
redirection.score_description: Initial redirection is to HTTPS on same host, final destination is HTTPS

strict-transport-security.name: strict-transport-security
strict-transport-security.score_description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) header set to a minimum of six months (15768000)

subresource-integrity.name: subresource-integrity
subresource-integrity.score_description: Subresource Integrity (SRI) not implemented, but all external scripts are loaded over HTTPS
